Text: this isn't even an ep it's a behind the scenes crap

Thanks for the up! Always love seeing the cast specials.

My audio fucks up at 37:28. Comes back from commercial break and audio reverts back to earlier in the program. The last 8min of the show the audio is only that.

DJCayman:

The good news is that while 2HD did both MP4 & MKV, they only screwed up the MP4.

The MKV audio is just fine.

It only takes a minute to spot check these things, ya know.

AVIGUY

My curiosity literally twists my arm behind my back and makes me do things.
I just had to know, so I checked then I checked and then I checked again.
Here's the two-part rule for S03E00:

If it's MKV, it's error free - both of them.
If it's AVI, it's error free - both of them.
